seo.title_override: Detroit Mattress Disposal Guide 2026 | Rules & Options
seo.meta_desc_override: Dispose of your mattress in Detroit with confidence. Learn local rules, including checking city guidelines for curbside pickup. No fines for proper disposal.

hero_hook: Figuring out how to properly dispose of an old mattress in Detroit can be confusing, especially with city curbside pickup status often unclear.
neighborhoods: Corktown, Midtown, New Center, Indian Village, Mexicantown, Jefferson-Chalmers, Boston-Edison, Palmer Woods, Woodbridge, Lafayette Park, Eastern Market, Grandmont Rosedale, University District, Bagley, Osborn

weather_profile.rejection_risk_copy: WARNING: Detroit averages 100+ rainy days per year. If your mattress gets wet before pickup, the city WILL NOT take it (too heavy, mold risk). Our haulers pick up from inside your home — rain or shine.
